properties.headline: Flood Watch issued January 9 at 11:15AM CST until January 14 at 11:32AM CST by NWS Chicago IL
properties.description:
...The National Weather Service in Chicago has issued a Flood Watch
for the following rivers in Illinois...

Mazon River near Coal City affecting Grundy County
Vermilion River at Pontiac affecting Livingston County
Vermilion River near Leonore affecting La Salle County

The following forecasts are based on observed precipitation as well
as forecast precipitation 72 hours into the future.

The National Weather Service in Chicago has issued a
* Flood Watch for
The Vermilion River at Pontiac, or from Near Pontiac downstream to
IL-23 near Streator.
* from late Saturday night to Tuesday morning.
* At 10:45 AM Thursday the stage was 3.3 feet.
* Moderate flooding is possible.
* Flood stage is 14.0 feet.
* Forecast...Flood stage may be reached by Sunday morning. The
river may crest near 17 feet Monday morning.
* Impact...At 17.0 feet...Numerous residences threatened along Grove
Street south of the river in Pontiac. Washington Elementary School
is threatened in Pontiac.
